content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message that the "delete_file" command for "file_logger.txt" returned an error stating the file had already been deleted. I requested a list of files in the current directory using the "list_files" command and received a response with a list of file names, including "file_logger.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "text": "Appended text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "old_text": "Appended text.", "new_text": "Replaced text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: Error: File has already been deleted.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'featured_article.txt', '<filename>', 'eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'productive_things_to_do.txt', 'clockify_info.txt', 'clockify_features.txt', 'pumble_features.txt', 'pumble_pricing.txt', 'automate_task.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py']", type='action_result')]
"""
